header.title: Brand new way in controlling mind activity

about.body_1: We work in a field of neurology. Our main aim is to bring the advanced technology of processing brain waves and deep analyzes to public.
about.body_2: The solution is served as a cloud service with an advanced expert system, whose main aim is to analyze and predict future mental state of user. Also, we provide an admin panel - for performing deep analyze, and mobile app - as a main client.
about.body_3: Please refer to resources, in order to be more aware about our services and solutions.

1.title: Get app
1.body: Download the app from our site. Then register and activate the app.

2.title: Connect neurointerface
2.body: Connect the neurointerface device to app (for the moment, we provide support only for

3.title: You are ready
3.body: Get concentrated on your tasks, and if system detect decrease of your mental state, then it will notify you.

4.title: Analyze
4.body: Every time you use the app, it syncs with our cloud service, where most analytics happen. You can observe it from mobile app, or from admin zone.

5.title: Predict
5.body: Get the latest analytics from our wise cloud service, and foresee future stress and probability of activity decrease.

first.body: measure your mental state level in live mode.

second.body: Store and manage your data in cloud.

third.body: Perform deep analyze, watch raw data, and even write your own function for our expert system.
